title.value: Map - Pin Tooltip All Location Data

description.value: Verify tooltip with all location data appears on Stage and Storefront but not Edit Panel.

comment.userInput: Verify No Tooltip On Edit Panel

title.value: Map - Location Name Attribute - Common Characters

description.value: Make sure the map accepts common characters for Location Name

title.value: Map - Location Name Attribute - Special Characters

description.value: Make sure the map accepts special characters for Location Name

title.value: Map - Location Name Attribute - Invalid Inputs

description.value: Make sure the map does not accept the following values for Location Name: empty string, space character
A user should be able to add positive latitude and longitudes

comment.userInput: Stage: Verify Map Has Pin After Save
Edit Panel: Verify Coordinates After Save

description.value: A user should be able to add negative latitude and longitudes

comment.userInput: Stage: Verify Map Has Pin After Save
Edit Panel: Verify Coordinates After Save

title.value: Map - Add Pin To Map By Inputting Coordinates: Latitude 0, Longitude 0

description.value: A user should be able to add a pin to a map on the Edit Panel by inputting coordinates and see the pin on Edit Panel, Stage, and Storefront. Test with 0 latitude and 0 longitude

comment.userInput: Input Coordinates To Add Pin To Map
Stage: Verify Map Has Pin After Save
Edit Panel: Verify Coordinates After Save

description.value: Make sure the map does not accept the following values for Latitude: empty string, space character, non-numeric character, less than -85.05, greater than 85.05

comment.userInput: Add Valid Latitude After Errors And Verify Map Has Pin

description.value: Make sure the map does not accept the following values for Longitude: empty string, space character, non-numeric character, less than -180.05, greater than 180.05

comment.userInput: Add Valid Longitude After Errors And Verify Map Has Pin

title.value: Map - Add Pin Then Remove Then Add and Verify

description.value: Make sure the user can add a map after adding a map and then removing it.

comment.userInput: Add Pin To Map After Error

description.value: Make sure the map accepts common characters for Street Address

description.value: Make sure the map accepts special characters for Street Address
